heading: HB00016
0: AN ACT FOR THE CONSTRUCTION OF A LIGHT RAIL TRANSPORT (LRT) SYSTEM OR METRO RAIL TRANSPORT (MRT) SYSTEM OR MONORAIL TRANSPORT OVER, AS WELL AS A SUBWAY TRANSPORT SYSTEM UNDER THE THREE (3) MOST CONGESTED ROAD SECTIONS IN THE FIRST DISTRICT OF THE CITY OF CEBU AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
status: Pending with the Committee on TRANSPORTATION since 2019-07-23
